entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cold Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Cold Lake 09:30 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: ESE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 07:37 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 07:37 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 07:37 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
